guide.introduction_rendered:
Relevant parts
  • 3v relay
  • 22 awg wire
  • 9v battery snap
  • 9 Volt alkaline battery
  • cellphone (disposable)
  • Project box, small
  • SPST toggle switch
  • aligator clips
Tools
  • Dremel tool with cutting and drilling bits.
  • Phillips 2 Screwdriver
  • Soldering Iron and rosin core solder.
  • Wire cutter/stripper
  • liquid tape

lines.text: call the company to activate the phone.
lines.text_raw: call the company to activate the phone.

lines.text: use a knife to crack open the phone,but don't break it we need it working.
lines.text_raw: use a knife to crack open the phone,but don't break it we need it working.

lines.text: remove it and solder to the contacts on the PHONE (not the motor). and dont for get to put liquid tape on your solder joints.
lines.text_raw: remove it and solder to the contacts on the PHONE (not the motor). and dont for get to put liquid tape on your solder joints.

lines.text: drill holes to accommodate the wire.
lines.text_raw: drill holes to accommodate the wire.

lines.text: solder the + coil terminal of the relay to the + wire on the cell phone.then solder the - coil terminal to the - wire on the cell phone
lines.text_raw: solder the + coil terminal of the relay to the + wire on the cell phone.then solder the - coil terminal to the - wire on the cell phone

lines.text: solder the snaps in series and solder the + end of the battery snap wire to one end of the relay switch and a really long wire on the other end of the switch.
lines.text_raw: solder the snaps in series and solder the + end of the battery snap wire to one end of the relay switch and a really long wire on the other end of the switch.

lines.text: then solder the - wire of the battery snap to one terminal of the SPST switch.next solder the other piece of long wire to the other end of the switch.
lines.text_raw: then solder the - wire of the battery snap to one terminal of the SPST switch.next solder the other piece of long wire to the other end of the switch.

steps.title: Mount the circuit in the project box.

lines.text: Drill holes to accommodate the switch,phone wires, and long wires
lines.text_raw: Drill holes to accommodate the switch,phone wires, and long wires

lines.text: solder the alligator clips to the long wires. and finally insert the batteries. and you can optionally hot glue the phone to the box.
lines.text_raw: solder the alligator clips to the long wires. and finally insert the batteries. and you can optionally hot glue the phone to the box.

guide.summary: Modify a cheap throwaway cellphone into a wireless relay controller! Now when anybody calls the number on your modified phone the relay will activate.
